body:
Hi Drogus,

I get a failing test:

      1) Failure:
    test_isolated_engine_should_avoid_namespace_in_names_if_that's_possible(RailtiesTest::EngineTest)
        [test/railties/engine_test.rb:573:in `test_isolated_engine_should_avoid_namespace_in_names_if_that's_possible'
         /users/mikel/Code/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/testing/isolation.rb:65:in `run'
         /users/mikel/Code/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/testing/isolation.rb:100:in `run_in_isolation'
         /users/mikel/Code/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/testing/isolation.rb:97:in `fork'
         /users/mikel/Code/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/testing/isolation.rb:97:in `run_in_isolation'
         /users/mikel/Code/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/testing/isolation.rb:63:in `run']:
    <nil> is not true.

Please check it out and let me know when passing.

Mikel
